statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ 8 \\ -11 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -36 \\ 12 \\ -30 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
